isLoggedInIf1: You will receive your payment in your
isLoggedInIf2: account. A confirmation(Email/SMS) has been sent to you.
isLoggedInElse1: An Email/SMS confirmation has been sent to the address on record. You will receive your payment in your
thankyouText: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your PayPal account within 2-3 hours. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
